# py-mixins

## Overview

Mixin classes which may be added to your own classes to add certain functionality to them.

## Getting Started

Install `mixins`:

```
pip install mixins
```

A simple example:

```python
import mixins

# Do something with mixins
```

## Links

See the
[documentation here.](
https://nickderobertis.github.io/py-mixins/
)
